verses.name: Genesis 1:1
verses.text: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.

verses.name: Genesis 1:2
verses.text: And the earth was without form.

verses.name: Genesis 1:3
verses.text: And God said, Let there be light.

verses.name: Genesis 3:1
verses.text: Now the serpent was more subtil.

verses.name: Genesis 3:2
verses.text: And the woman said unto the serpent.

verses.name: Genesis 3:3
verses.text: But of the fruit of the tree.
